original: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare.
analyzed: tasmai hi amham daharāḥ na miyyare

original: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na miyyare.
analyzed: tasmai hi amham daharāḥ na miyyare
na hi te iṇam atthi iti
rosā iti vā na ca dā iti

original: Aṭṭhahi bhikkhave aṅgehi sampannāgatassa upāsakassa patto nikujjitabbo. Bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhahi bhikkhave aṅgehi sampanna āgatassa upāsakassa pattaḥ nikujjitabbaḥ bhikkhūnam

original: alābhāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anatthāya parisakkati, bhikkhūnaṃ anāvāsāya parisakkati,
analyzed: alābhāya parisakkati bhikkhūnam anatthāya parisakkati bhikkhūnam anāvāsāya parisakkati

original: bhikkhūnaṃ akkosati paribhāsati, bhikkhūbhikkhūhi bhedeti, buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati,
analyzed: bhikkhūnam akkosati paribhāsati bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedeti buddhassa avaṇṇam bhāsati

original: dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi aṭṭhahi
analyzed: dhammassa avaṇṇam bhāsati saṅghassa avaṇṇam bhāsati anujānāmi bhikkhave imehi aṭṭhahi
aṅgehi sampanna āgatassa upāsakassa pattam nikujjitum
kaḥ me imam puttam akāsi evam
